languages.text: "Как раз эта черепушка отлично работает, в отличие от твоей. Сигнал от детонатора почти прошел — пора украсить палубу твоими кишками".
"That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — time to adorn the deck with your intestines."
languages.original_text: "Как раз эта черепушка отлично работает, в отличие от твоей. Сигнал от детонатора почти прошел — пора украсить палубу твоими кишками".

traits.locale_text: "That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — it is time to adorn the deck with your intestines."
"That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — it is time to adorn the deck with your intestines."
"That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — time to adorn the deck with your intestines."
"That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — time to adorn the deck with your intestines."
"That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — time to adorn the deck with your intestines."
"That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — time to adorn the deck with your intestines."

languages.text: «Ese cráneo, al contrario que el tuyo, funciona perfectamente. La señal casi ha llegado al detonador. Es hora de decorar la cubierta con tus intestinos».
languages.original_text: "That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — time to adorn the deck with your intestines."

traits.locale_text: «Ese cráneo, al contrario que el tuyo, funciona perfectamente. La señal casi ha llegado al detonador. Es hora de decorar la cubierta con tus intestinos».

languages.text: “这颗头骨保养得很好，和你头上那颗可不一样。起爆器的信号应该已经生效了。好了，我要用你的肠子来装饰一下甲板了。”
languages.original_text: "That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — time to adorn the deck with your intestines."

traits.locale_text: “这颗头骨保养得很好，和你头上那颗可不一样。起爆器的信号应该已经生效了。好了，我要用你的肠子来装饰一下甲板了。”

languages.text: « Contrairement au vôtre, ce crâne fonctionne parfaitement bien. Le compte à rebours du détonateur est presque terminé... l'heure est venue de redécorer le pont avec vos entrailles. »
languages.original_text: "That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — time to adorn the deck with your intestines."

traits.locale_text: « Contrairement au vôtre, ce crâne fonctionne parfaitement bien. Le compte à rebours du détonateur est presque terminé... l'heure est venue de redécorer le pont avec vos entrailles. »

languages.text: 「お前のとは違って、そのスカルは完璧な状態だ。起爆装置からのシグナルはほとんど終わっている―お前の腸でデッキを装飾する時間だ」
languages.original_text: "That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — time to adorn the deck with your intestines."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のとは違って、そのスカルは完璧な状態だ。起爆装置からのシグナルはほとんど終わっている―お前の腸でデッキを装飾する時間だ」

languages.text: "Hizmelet, senin aksine ne olduğunun ve kapasitesinin gayet farkında. Sinyal, patlayıcıya ulaşmak üzere. Bağırsaklarını süs niyetine güverteye saçma zamanı."
languages.original_text: "That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — time to adorn the deck with your intestines."

traits.locale_text: "Hizmelet, senin aksine ne olduğunun ve kapasitesinin gayet farkında. Sinyal, patlayıcıya ulaşmak üzere. Bağırsaklarını süs niyetine güverteye saçma zamanı."

languages.text: "Dieser Schädel funktioniert im Gegensatz zu Eurem bestens. Das Signal des Zünders ist gleich durch ... wird Zeit, das Deck mit Euren Innereien zu schmücken."
languages.original_text: "That skull, unlike your own, is in perfect working order. The signal from the detonator is almost through — time to adorn the deck with your intestines."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Schädel funktioniert im Gegensatz zu Eurem bestens. Das Signal des Zünders ist gleich durch ... wird Zeit, das Deck mit Euren Innereien zu schmücken."
